Content.Text:
<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Why hello there, <MYNAME>! You've come at
the perfect time.
<PAGE>
Have a seat right here, dearie. I'll put on some
tea.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't have much at the moment, but do take a
seat and relax, okay?
<FONT_SIZE_L>Granny, I came to help out!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, Granny! Want me to help with the chickens
today?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo! You came to help out too?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's the spirit! ♪ But how about I take care of
things for today so you two can have tea
together?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you, dear.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh my. He said he was going to help with the
chickens. I hope everything's going okay out
there...

Hey! Where do you think you're going? Get back
here!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
It sounds like there's quite a racket outside.
<MYNAME>, dear, would you please go check
on him?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
C'mon, please? Pleeease go back in the coop?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dwuh?! <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, uh... I-I was just playing with this little guy!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wait, that's right! I told Granny I'd have tea with
her today!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I'm gonna go look in on her. Could you put this
guy back in the coop?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh! H-hey, <MYNAME>. Is the chicken back in
the coop?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, did something happen?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ummm... Guess it's about time I headed home.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'll stop by later to help out again, Granny!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'd be very grateful if you would, dear. Thank you
for your help today.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It sounds like he may have caused some trouble
for you. I'm sorry, dear.
Well, maybe a little.
Nah, it was nothing much.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh-ho! So he DID get in over his head again.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? That's good to hear. Sometimes he can be a
real handful when he's helping out.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fritz is a very sweet boy, but he can be a bit of a
scatterbrain sometimes. Please don't hold it
against him.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm just glad that he comes to visit me.
<PAGE>
It'd make me happy if you and he became good
friends.
